full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 85 of 228 761 LC2Qmax3 Rocchio - Cross 1 Q. Yeah. And there are other respected professionals who disagree with some of your opinions about this topic, correct? 2 A. I -- I couldn't answer that. I'm not sure. 3 Q. Well, for example, Dr. Dietz, correct? 4 A. Which aspect of my opinion are you suggesting? Could you 5 be more specific? 6 Q. Well, you are aware from your review of the literature, for 7 example, that Dr. O'Donohue has a disagreement with your 8 opinion on the topic of grooming, correct? 9 A. I think that there are -- we're actually largely consistent 10 in terms of the literature, both publications by Bennett and 11 O'Donohue and by Dietz. 12 Q. Okay. Some of the things that -- well, your testifying 13 here is what's commonly referred to as a blind expert, correct? 14 A. Correct. 15 Q. And that basically means that you don't have any factual 16 information about the case, correct? 17 A. It typically means I haven't evaluated any of the parties 18 in the case, and I'm testifying about specific subject matter 19 expertise. 20 Q. Right. So, for example, you don't know any of the 21 individuals who are making allegations in this case, right? 22 A. No, I do not. 23 Q. And you haven't talked to any of the prosecution witnesses 24 in this case, correct? 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012370
